H0.text: the king of kalinga in the mauryan period was. Kharavela

H1.text: the king of kalinga in the mauryan period was. Bimbisara

H2.text: the king of kalinga in the mauryan period was. Chandragupta Maurya

H3.text: the king of kalinga in the mauryan period was. Ashoka

A4.text: According to Ashoka's Major Rock Edict 13, he conquered Kalinga 8 years after ascending to the throne.

A5.text: The Edicts of Ashoka state that during his eighth regnal year, he conquered Kalinga after a brutal war.

A6.text: Ashoka's grandfather Chandragupta had possibly attempted to conquer Kalinga but had been repulsed.

A7.text: The Kalinga war was fought between the Mauryan Empire under Ashoka the Great and Kalinga, an independent feudal kingdom.

A8.text: Ashoka conquers the Kingdom of Kalinga (262â€“261 BCE).
